Don't Just Take it From Us

Here is what our clients are saying

It is my great pleasure to highly recommend Suku Technologies. FC Beauty Group is comprised of 6 subsidiaries. At the time when we contacted Suku Technologies, we were running each subsidiary independently and with its own technological platform. This created a myriad of organizational challenges for us. When we hired Suku Technologies, their multidisciplinary team was quickly able to understand our challenges and develop a multifaceted, innovative and integrated technological solution which has resulted in significant growth and better client service delivery. We are indebted to Suku Technologies for their leadership, innovation and results oriented approach to developing solutions for our needs. Their ability to distill Client needs into a pragmatic approach while also deftly balancing this with the Client's organizational goals and objectives is unparalleled.

MRS. GRACE AMEY-OBENG

CEO, FC Beauty Group

BOLGATANGA TECHNICAL UNIVERSITY is the number 1 technical university in the Upper East Region of Ghana. As an institution of higher learning, we recognized that our outreach to students and potential students was severely impeded by our inability to find the right technological partner. We worked with several technology service providers to no avail. We were pleasantly surprised when we were introduced to Suku Technologies and they took the time to understand our requirements by undertaking a comprehensive assessment. Despite our budgetary constraints, Suku Technologies provided a tailor-made solution that was of a high level of quality but yet tremendously cost-efficient. Suku Technologies is a leader in its field and we often marveled at how the team was so dedicated to the assignment, paid keen attention to details and was responsive beyond the call of duty by providing direct support whenever needed irrespective of whether the assistance was needed during the week or on weekends. We are tremendously happy with the service provided and will recommend them to anyone without hesitation

PROF. SAMUEL ERASMUS ALNAA

Rector, Bolgatanga Technical University

It is my great pleasure to highly recommend Suku Technologies. FC Beauty Group is comprised of 6 subsidiaries. At the time when we contacted Suku Technologies, we were running each subsidiary independently and with its own technological platform. This created a myriad of organizational challenges for us.
